turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I was looking to order some pizzas from a new pizzeria called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, all here are the instructions. I want two pizzas both of them are small, one of them is cheese only and the other one has pepperoni and Italian sausage as the toppings and for both pizzas I would like them to both have extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: 2 small pizzas. one is cheese, the other with pepperoni and sausage, extra cheese on both, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small pizzas. one is cheese, the other with pepperoni and sausage, extra cheese on both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bella luna's soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Well, I appreciate all the work. Thank you.
